NuGridPy¶

NuGridPy is a Python package containing tools to access and analyse (e.g. plot) various output formats (including the hdf5-based se format) from NuGrid codes (mppnp and ppn) and from the MESA stellar evolution code.

Documentation:¶

nugridpy.astronomy Constants and methods for astronomy & astrophysics
nugridpy.ascii_table Ascii_table.py: read and write simple ascii tables
nugridpy.data_plot data_plot.py
nugridpy.grain grain.py is a collection of routines to analyze presolar grain data
nugridpy.h5T h5T.py V1.1 created by Will Hillary
nugridpy.mesa MESA output data loading and plotting
nugridpy.nugridse nugridse is a collection of plots of data in se-type h5 files.
nugridpy.ppn Analyze and visualize the output of single-zone ppn simulations
nugridpy.utils utils.py
